pages.text: $(li)The Illagers have been researching immortality for years in the Woodland Mansion.$(br)$(li)They store the results of their experiments here. The most important item, the Totem of Undying can be found here.$(br)$(li)Be careful, Evokers and Vindicators will not hesitate to defend their mansion for intruders.
$(li)The Woodland Mansion can be found in the Dark Forest biome.
